description:
This course is intended for Bernina Software 7 owners who want to learn all the ins and outs of Bernina Software 7.

This course is 66 min of Bernina Software 7, and the fourth course of 36 courses where we will explain the workings of Bernina Software 7.

We have broken Bernina Software 7 down into 36 courses of not more than 60 min each for your convenience. In each course we will cover a section of the software.

  • Explain what the Cheat Sheet are, and how to apply this in digitizing shortcut
  • Multihooping: how to manage, what to use it, and some uses in single hooping.
  • Embroidery Canvas, Corel Canvas and how to use each, or both to create artwork
  • Copy and Paste, undo and redo, this options allow freedom in creation
  • Explaining Portfolio, cross stitch and Quilt program as additional add on.
  • U.S vs Metric is easy to manage, also where to find help for each icon if needed
  • Carving Stamp, Morphing a design and manage your zoom function
  • Select tool, Polygon select tool for easier editing following up with reshaping
  • Using selected handles, 45degree option, as well as precise graduation
  • Using viewing tools while you digitize is a must to work to perfection
  • Understanding the color film will make stitch order a play in the park
  • Design View artistic or in stitchformat, as well as stitch viewing helps to plan

Please feel free to try class 4 of 36 and then come join us for the other classes in this series.
title: #04: Bernina Software 7 Master the Fundamentals: Cheat Sheet
